data.actual_result: The opened context menu turns on, then jumps to another location
data.expected_result: The opened context menu turns on, then off, then on again
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have a keyboard button for right clicking - Click the text box of a channel - Press the right click button on your keyboard - Click away from the text box (eg, a message) - Press the right click button on your keyboard twice
